verses.name: Genesis 17:1
verses.text: And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the Lord appeared to Abram, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.

verses.name: Genesis 17:2
verses.text: And I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.

verses.name: Genesis 17:3
verses.text: And Abram fell on his face: and God talked with him, saying,

verses.name: Genesis 17:4
verses.text: As for me, behold, my covenant is with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations.

verses.name: Genesis 17:5
verses.text: Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be Abraham; for a father of many nations have I made thee.
